name: BrainStorm (itch) (Juan Rodrigues, Sapobi, mrbyte, wsman217)
description:
Caio is a highschool student that gets really anxious during exams.
He wakes up today and finds out that he completely forgot about his final exam in English!

Caio is worried that Anxiety Monster will take over his thoughts and he will lose his only chance to be accepted into Pixel World University.

Caio is running away from Anxiety Monster in his mind.
Help him stay focused!

How to play

The player needs to type the words that appear on the screen. If the player misses any letter or fails to type the whole word on time, the monster will walk one step closer to Caio.

After 6 steps, Caio gets caught by his anxiety.
